version.description: The version number of the waveform data format.

channels.description: The number of waveform channels present (version 2 only).

sample_rate.description: Sample rate of original audio file (Hz).

samples_per_pixel.description: Number of audio samples per waveform minimum/maximum pair.

bits.description: Resolution of waveform data. May be either 8 or 16.

length.description: Length of waveform data (number of minimum and maximum value pairs per channel).

data.description: Array of minimum and maximum waveform data points, interleaved. Depending on bits, each value may be in the range -128 to +127 or -32768 to +32727.

jwt.description: request a jwt token, if the client is an app or browser from another domain

position.description: the position of the bookmark (in ms)

remove.description: add or remove the item fav

JamParameters.TrackMoveParent.description: Move track file(s) to new folder parent

fixID.description: which issue to fix with the track

JamParameters.FolderArtworkNew.description: Add an artwork to a folder by url

JamParameters.FolderArtworkEditName.description: Rename an artwork in a folder

JamParameters.FolderArtworkUpload.description: Add an artwork to a folder by upload

JamParameters.FolderMoveParent.description: Move track folders(s) to new folder parent

isPublic.description: set the playlist visible for other users or not

trackIDs.description: track ids of the playlist, may include duplicates

isPublic.description: set the playlist visible for other users or not

trackIDs.description: track ids of the playlist, may include duplicates
the track ids of the playqueue

currentID.description: the track id of the current playing track

position.description: the position in the current playing track

password.description: current password of calling user (or admin) is required to create the user. this is NOT the user password
password of calling user (or admin) is required to change user settings
current password of calling user (or admin) is required to change the password
password of calling user (or admin) is required to change the email address

id.description: id of user (only admins can change images of other users)

refreshMeta.description: the scan strategy for the root
the scan strategy for the root
